title: Anandat-tOzharAi
sahitya:
Anandat-tOzharAi vAzhvOmE anaivarukkum anbu shUzhvOmE


anupallavi

  tEnukkuLLE vaLarum tittippaip-pOlE UnukkuLLE vaLarum orumaiyai uNarndE


caraNam    AtkaLai shuTriya amarkkaLa samayamum asaTTup-pirivinaiyum kuruTTu matha vAdamum
nATkaLai shUdADum naraka vinOdamum nAgarIkamAna mOha valaiyum
naccuk-kadir veDiyum nAsha suyanalamum nammai aNugAda nimmati aDaindE
accamaTra amara vAzhvin uccamuTra UtrilArum saccidAnandat-aruvi
thaTa thaTa tANDavamADit-taDangal kalaippadaip-pOlE
